headline: How The Carrier Global (CARR) Narrative Is Evolving With Mixed Targets And New Growth Drivers
summary: Carrier Global’s latest fair value estimate has been nudged from US$72.18 to US$71.66, a small shift that still matters if you are tracking where analysts think the stock should land. That adjustment sits alongside a wave of mixed price target moves across the Street, with some firms lifting their targets by US$2 to US$6 and others cutting down to levels such as US$70 or US$55 as they reassess growth and earnings assumptions. Read on to see what is driving these calls and how you can keep up...
